function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"False negative results in NAAT testing due to targeting a single gene","Impact":"Undiagnosed infection leading to the potential spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Use of a different specimen and target sequence in subsequent tests as recommended by WHO","Technologies":"Nucleic Acid Amplification Tests (NAATs)","People":"Patients undergoing NAAT testing","Owner":"Healthcare professionals"},{"Description":"Inability of serological tests to detect early-stage infection","Impact":"Delayed diagnosis and potential spread of the virus during the early stages of infection","Mitigation":"Combining serological tests with other diagnostic methods for early detection","Technologies":"Serological tests","People":"Individuals being tested for COVID-19","Owner":"Healthcare professionals"},{"Description":"Ambiguity in diagnosing past infections with NAAT and serological tests","Impact":"Lack of insight into past infections and potential underestimation of the true infection rate","Mitigation":"Use of complementary testing methods and thorough patient history to determine previous infection status","Technologies":"Nucleic Acid Amplification Tests (NAATs), Serological tests","People":"Healthcare professionals, individuals seeking testing","Owner":"Public health authorities"}]}
